Name: Crashnauts
About the game: ATTENTION: THIS GAME IS BEST PLAYED WITH FRIENDS. (AI bot players available as well!) Crashnauts is a 2-6 player Arena shooter that combines frenetic Quake-like action with Smash Bros. style brawling! Current Features Crash with friends in local PvP and with AI bots! (Online play will be added in future update) Gib your enemies with beloved weapons such as rocket and rail guns, and new entries like the power glove! 4 Races to choose from with a plethora, yes, plethora of customizations! Play on scrolling maps that keep you on your toes. Respawn on your enemies with a devastating crash pod that rockets down from outer space! Battle in traditional game modes including FFA TDM (With objective based modes coming soon). Tight and responsive gameplay. Get hundreds of headshots
